text:
Artificial Intelligence is revolutionizing 
nearly every aspect of our society.

Recent technologies like
neural networks, deep learning, foundation models

have led to powerful new AI
capabilities and applications. But how do

you stay on top of a field where things
are changing so fast, especially when you
already have a day job?

I'm Chris Manning, professor of
computer science and linguistics,

and director of the Stanford
Artificial Intelligence Lab here in the

heart of Silicon Valley. Even if you're
not a student in my classroom here at

Stanford there's a way for you to learn
about the latest research and practical

applications of AI directly from our
world-class faculty. In our Artificial

Intelligence Professional Program at
Stanford Online. You'll get the same

rigorous, cutting-edge content we teach
in our graduate courses here at Stanford.

In each 10-week online course you'll have
the opportunity to meet your peers from

organizations around the world, to
test your knowhow in challenging

practical assignments, and to get support
and feedback from course facilitators--

people who have taken the graduate
courses themselves and are now working

in industry. Our courses cover many of
the major branches of AI:

machine learning, reinforcement learning, 
neural networks, natural language

processing and understanding. 
Stanford's world-renowned
faculty are research trailblazers who have
profoundly shaped the subjects that they teach.

They're not just instructors, they're the
architects of AI. Stanford has long been

at the forefront of AI, In fact, the term
"artificial intelligence" was coined by

former Stanford computer science
professor John McCarthy who organized a

summer conference at Dartmouth in the
1950s. John was the founder of the

Stanford Artificial Intelligence Lab
that I'm honored to lead today.

So, whether you're an aspiring AI
professional, or an established expert

looking to take your skills to the next
level, the Stanford AI Professional

Program will challenge, inspire, and
empower you to unlock the tremendous

potential of AI and to become a leader
in the field.
Come join us at Stanford Online.
